name: Karma clicker: devil's cookie case adventure
name_original: Karma clicker: devil's cookie case adventure
description:
Karma Clicker: Devil Adventure.
Time to make the world a better place! Cookie case are teasing you?

Power yourself up, summon help and begin clicking!

Your tap adventure starts here!

* Start out small, grow to become Great!
* Buy upgrades, spread your influence, summon Help and gather Karma to grow stronger!
* Classical idle-game mechanics combined with clicking! Play the way you like it!

Unique features!
* Many hours and days of gameplay!
* Beautiful, humorous and rich graphics and animations!
* Gameplay continues even when you turn off the app!
* Your achievements also alter your appearance! Turn more and more fabulous as you progress!
* LOTS of upgrades and powerups, with hilarious and unique descriptions! Over 150 of them in total!
* Soft reset mechanics include decision making for more advanced playing techniques!

Fate of the world hangs in balance! Hurry!
